text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

No matter how hard she runs, Rice can't seem to find a win. Still, she 
hasn't given up on training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Gotta give credit to Rice. Takes a whole lotta something to keep 
running her heart out after all those losses.
Makes you wish we could get her a win somehow…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pardon the intrusion.
Wait, McQueen?!

Out of the blue, McQueen shows up to practice. It feels like it's been 
forever since she left the team.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I saw Rice didn't do so well in her last race. How's she doing now?

She's still got the drive, and she's training like always, but for some 
reason she just can't deliver.

She's still got the drive, and she's training like always, but for some 
reason she just can't deliver.

She's just… missing something. That something she had when she 
raced you and Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Perhaps she's lost sight of a target to chase.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Which means that if you're able to give her a new target, she may run 
like she once did.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: In other words… I'd best hurry and get changed.
choice_data_list: Wait, what? You're going to run?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Why else do you think I've come here?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I still have some unfinished business, but I have a bit more free time 
than before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Besides, I don't think I can wait any longer to run with the team again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, but before that, I have a favor to ask you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?! And…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I received a sudden invite to come help out.
McQueen's "favor" was for me to call Mihono Bourbon over.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've been waiting for you to return to form. Hopefully this session 
brings you closer to a win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon… You're the best!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now then, just like old times, I want you to follow right behind 
Bourbon and me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Right! Just keep following you and Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Just to clarify, that does not include in our private lives. Follow within reason, please.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right! I'll chase Rice from behind then! And when I catch up to her, 
I'll yank her tail!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: We'll help out too!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ooh, then how about we take turns setting the pace?

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Okay! Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice, seeing your hard work… your indomitable spirit, is a big 
inspiration to us all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now show us once more—how you left me and Bourbon in the dust.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Okay. I will!

Team Sirius. A team whose members continually inspire and push each 
other to be better.

With the encouragement of her teammates, Rice takes to the track 
once more—her second spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hey Trainer, if I win, you'll take us to that famous amusement park… 
right?
Why do you think I've been eating so much instant ramen?
Why do you think I've been eating so much instant ramen?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheh… But you know, I like the other park too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're there, and the team's there, we can have fun 
anywhere. Just seeing the others smile makes me smile too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And I want to make them smile today. So I'm going to give this race 
my all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I should get going now!

She looks so tiny compared to the expanse of turf, but she makes it 
hers.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Here's Rice Shower! She makes her move! She's pushed up into the 
lead!

Even when her will to win seemed faint, she refused to give up, and 
just kept running.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower isn't giving up the lead! She's desperately holding on! 
And now… she's done it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower returns to the winner's circle in the spring Tenno Sho!
And I'm not the only one who's taken notice.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
After denying so many records, and losing so many times, she finally 
wins, huh.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: How long were you gonna make us wait?! Congrats, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Good job! You were great!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-wha—?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The cheers are deafening! The entire stadium is lavishing Rice Shower 
with praise!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: They… they're happy… They're smiling!

When the whole world seemed to be dragging her down, she crawled 
back up, one step at a time.

She held on. Worked harder than ever. And now, she's rewarded with 
love from all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Thank you, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'll keep running, forever and ever! I'll run until the whole world's 
smiling!
